title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Competencies: Foundations of Object-Oriented Programming: Mobile Microlearning-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming syntax (C/C++ or similar languages)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain core object-oriented programming concepts such as classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism
Learners can perform actual code writing and debugging processes using mobile tutoring systems
Learners can apply learned OOP concepts to real-world problem solving through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
